name: Alien Blaze- Endless Runner && Platformer
description:
Help our little alien buddy collect his lost coins in the void of space whilst avoiding various obstacles that appear before him. 

Try to run as far as possible, but watch out! Your speed will increase as you run, making things much more thrilling and satisfying! 

Super fun free 2D endless runner game that has amazing graphics while still being light on your devices battery and power.

- Fun yet challenging gameplay with high quality graphics and effects!
-  Challenge your friends with Leaderboard support to prove who's the best!
- Multiple unique characters to choose from!
- Numerous different upgrades!
- Simple touch controls!
- Lightweight and compatible with low-end devices!
- Fast paced gameplay that tests your reflexes!
